talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
After the world was created, this place was constructed with the remaining fragments of the Goddess Atelia's dream.
I am Madeleine, Guardian of the Space Courtyard.
I am always watching over this new nest.
